\e\[97;41m                                              \e\[39;49m
\e\[97;41m  Third exception <fg=blue;bg=red>comment</>  \e\[39;49m
\e\[97;41m                                              \e\[39;49m

\e\[33mIn foo3\.cr line \d+:\e\[39m
\e\[97;41m                                               \e\[39;49m
\e\[97;41m  Second exception <comment>comment</comment>  \e\[39;49m
\e\[97;41m                                               \e\[39;49m

\e\[33mIn foo3\.cr line \d+:\e\[39m
\e\[97;41m                                       \e\[39;49m
\e\[97;41m  First exception <p>this is html</p>  \e\[39;49m
\e\[97;41m                                       \e\[39;49m
